attributes.action: Bring back mandatory self isolation and make telling employer mandatory!
attributes.additional_details:
High risk people were protected for a while but now you have removed all protection leaving high risk people at work with people with Covid who don't even have to tell their employer!

This will kill so many high risk!
I am terrified for our lives!

We know vaccines don't stop transmission and wearing a mask only protects others, so how we high risk people supposed to live when they can easily catch Covid now?!

I beg you to bring back mandatory self isolation and make telling employer mandatory
attributes.background:
Bring back mandatory self isolation and make telling employer mandatory!

As someone high risk who lives with someone even higher risk than me who works in an office as well, I am terrified for our lives!

You removed mandatory isolation leaving high risk people with no protection at all.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606834

If self-isolation was reinstated as requested by the above petition, workers would be legally required to self-isolate if they tested positive for covid-19, and would therefore need to tell their employer that they could not go to work.
